description: AI-friendly structured roadmap for onboarding noobs to coding basics, local setup, and first prototype.

phases.title: Environment Setup
phases.description: Guide the User to install OS tools, terminal basics, Git/GitHub, Python, and Node/TS.

phases.title: Teach Best Practices
phases.description: Introduce linting, typing, structure, and version control habits.

phases.title: Prototype Build
phases.description: Use natural language prompts to scaffold and incrementally build a simple web app locally.

phases.title: Deploy App
phases.description: Guide the User to optionally deploy via Vercel and verify deployment.

build_success: local dev server runs without errors
deployment_success: app reachable in browser via Vercel or equivalent
